author: Source: New York Post
title: Inspired Mets erupt to slam Utleya s Dodgers to the brink - New York Post
text:
Chase Utley may have sent Ruben Tejada to the hospital, but the Mets are on the verge of sending the Dodgers to the morgue. In a statement game, the Mets blocked out the noise surrounding Utley and his takeout slide that broke Tejada's right leg and turned the first playoff game in Citi Field history into a laugher Monday.
 New York Post.
